Topic.Title: If IBM the most profitable Tech company

Message.Msg: Ah, it's blackdorf the book value queen. Hint: add back the Treasury Share account dorf. Relax, don't worry, be happy. Big Blue's gonna keep on keepen on. While you stand idly by. A disgruntled book value queen. With an IBM fetish.

Topic.Title: Bernanke printing effect: poor will get poorer ... polarization will lead to revolution

Message.Title: DOES IBM HELP CHINESE HACKERS?
Message.Msg: Only reason I ask is I know they moved some operations to China (procurement, etc) so they probably gave the Chinese a direct path into their system. Globalization looks great on paper but when you see big corporate investments in these creepy countries like Russia and China you have to wonder how smart the CEO really is.
